All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Announcement
This class represents an Announcement entity in the application.
Coursework
This class represents a Coursework entity in the application.
CourseworkRepository
This interface provides a repository for the Coursework entity.
EmailController
This class provides a controller for handling email-related requests.
EmailService
This class provides an email service for the application.
Exam
This class represents an Exam entity in the application.
ExamRepository
This interface provides a repository for the Exam entity.
FileController
This class provides a controller for handling file-related requests.
FileService
This class provides a file service for the application.
Grade
This class represents a Grade entity in the application.
GradeRepository
This interface provides a repository for the Grade entity.
ModuleRepository
This interface provides a repository for the Modules entity.
Modules
This class represents a Modules entity in the application.
Staff
This class represents a Staff entity in the application.
StaffController
The StaffController class is responsible for handling HTTP requests related to staff operations.
StaffController.StudentDetail
A nested static class representing the detailed information of a student's assessment.
StaffRepository
This interface defines a repository for Staff entities.
StaffService
This class provides services related to staff operations such as login, account activation, password reset, and marking coursework.
Student
This class represents a Student entity in the application.
StudentController
The StudentController class is responsible for handling HTTP requests related to student operations.
StudentManagementApplication
this is a SpringBoot application
StudentManagementApplicationTests
This class is a unit test class for the StudentManagementApplication, used to test the methods in the application.
StudentRepository
This interface defines a repository for Student entities.
StudentService
This class provides a service for managing students in the application.
StudentServiceTest
This class is a unit test class for StudentService, used to test the methods in StudentService.
Teaching
This class represents a Teaching entity in the application.
TeachingRepository
This interface provides a repository for the Teaching entity.
TimetableController
This class provides a controller for handling timetable-related requests.
TimetableController.TestEvent
This class represents a test event in the application.
TimetableController.TestWeekTimetable
This class represents a timetable for a specific week in the application.
TimetableService
This class provides a service for managing timetables in the application.
